title: Line to Tschierva hut
creator_credit: Alberto Cavalcanti, Pro Telephon Zurich and GPO Film Unit
brief_description: Documents the effort by Swiss and British engineers to lay a telephone line to an alpine hut in Switzerland’s Roseg Valley. The films shows some of the hazards encountered and the difficulties overcome in establishing telephone communication through the mountainous, but beautiful, countryside. Cinematography, John Taylor. Music, Maurice Jaubert.
